Banner.Description: I have 9+ years of experience developing systems, , I excel in designing, developing, and implementing scalable solutions for complex business problems. Currently, I am working as an Associate Technical Architect at Euromonitor International, where I lead and mentor cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality, robust software products.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 9 years as a developer, I have consistently sought to hone my skills and embrace new challenges. I have worked extensively on frontend development with Angular, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and handling cloud infrastructure using AWS and Azure. I have led teams by fostering a culture of collaboration, setting clear objectives, and empowering my colleagues to achieve excellence.
My expertise also spans enhancing application performance, designing reusable components, and introducing innovative solutions that drive value and efficiency in the projects I lead.
Some of the technologies I have mastered and applied include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Technical Lead
Description: Facilitated reusable component (Angular) adoption, demonstrated time savings (20+ hours per component), and seamless isolated testing. Implemented end-to-end CI/CD on Azure. Successfully integrated 6 components across 10+ modules, running smoothly in production for 2 years.

Accelerated Extraction Application's transition from POC to production in 6 months. Collaborated with Product, Architecture Teams, and stakeholders to implement a process handling large-scale data (60 million rows). Reduced extraction time from 15 to 3 hours, analyzed bottlenecks, and prepared cloud cost operation wikis for informed decision-making.
Headed the development team to adhere to the highest level of quality standards and committed to an increase of 99% code quality while also ensuring requirements are accurately met.
Led and mentored 2 teams (9 memebers), upskilling and reskilling. Four mentees were promoted in the last 2 years.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Technical Lead
Description: Led development of a GUI for monitoring machine health in 370+ tissue manufacturing plants across the USA and Canada, enhancing operational efficiency.
Designed micro frontend architecture with Angular 12
AWS ECS (FARGATE) with Dot net core 3.1 microservices.
Led a team of 6 members and technical mentor in the front-end.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Developer
Description: Strengthened developmental methodologies by introducing a code-quality document.
Weekly workshop on New Age Technology.
Strengthened developmental methodologies by introducing a code-quality document.
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms
Built 14 websites using .Net, Angularjs 1.6, C#, SQL Server, CSS, and HTML.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
